nodes.title: Fix building syncthing on darwin host
Describe how to access web frontent of syncthing backend while development
Small extension of documentation on how to get it running from IDE.
Fix gingerbread issues launching the syncthing subprocess.
Code quality fix - Useless parentheses around expressions should be removed to prevent any misunderstanding.
Code quality fix - Classes and methods that rely on the default system encoding should not be used.
Don't use Process#exit() to avoid exit code 9.
Don't restart before config has been updated (fixes #398).
Experimental setting to keep a partial wakelock
[WIP] Check if JSON string is null before parsing.
Add warning that exported private key may be stored in an unsafe location
Add restriction for allowed WiFi SSIDs when WiFi-only sync
Fix "Wifi only" / "Charging only" not being applied immediately
Use CGO to build Syncthing with support for DNS
Updated phone,  7 inch tablet and Android TV screen shots
Remove unneeded compatibility classes, functions, library
First crack at implementing sharing functionality
Various visual fixes and resource refactoring
Fix 'bad mode' error when chmodding with +x
Bugfix: Request parameters are duplicated over and over
Update phone screenshots + new 7 inch tablet screenshots (ref #422)
Update phone screenshots + new 7 inch tablet screenshots
Build toolchain with 387 and ARMv5 support (fixes #336)
Added option to run syncthing as root (fixes #48).
Capture IOException when for closed file descriptor (fixes #382)
Compile Syncthing using the goos=android Go1.4 flag for ARM (fixes #46 and fixes #57)
Properly initiate the ZXing barcode scanner (fixes #322).
Increase GUI update interval and log get requests (fixes #362)
Only copy device ID when finger lifts
Download the latest Syncthing binaries when compiling on windows
Notify Syncthing when folders are deleted
Add option to run syncthing when tethering is enabled
Fix NPE when Async call completes after fragment was closed
Notify Syncthing when folders are deleted
Start the correct ZXing barcode scanner (fixes #322).
Ensure Syncthing is not running (fixes #92 and #96)
Do not add visual content if activity is finishing (fixes #312).
Work around for Samsung's MenuBuilder bug (fixes #307).
Fix back arrow in actionbar for Android 4.1+
Only access the version information when the SyncthingService is active (fixes #292).
Catch cases where GetTask returns null (fixes #270).
Maintain&check reference to GUI before changing it
Fix API access for devices < ICS
Fix NPE due to invalid mDevice reference
Persistent=false should be repeated for all subpreferences, a global persistent flag would have been too easy... (fixes #256)
Set announce color green if at least one is connected (fixes #249)
Compression is now a string instead of a boolean (fixes #245 and #239)
Remove redundant instructions for binary downloads
Link to the in-use Syncthing org
Project's owner changed, so the tip4commit link broke
Fix certificate issue on travis build
Adding the missing translation strings to "Options" and "GUI" menus
Use separate notification channel while monitoring run conditions
Prevent to post rooted sub to scanner rest api
Fix root startup of libsyncthing.so binary
Call suOut.flush on starting the syncthing binary using root - Fixes issue https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing-android/issues/1005
Fix issue #1005 Endless loader after enabling "Superuser mode"
MainActivity.java: Don't show Usage Reporting dialog if aready decided
Fix redundant reload of the web UI
Fix web UI being reloaded on orientation changes
Build Syncthing with CGO and target Android
Changed misleading title of sttrace option
Added german translation for string 'environment variables'
Fix permissions of config.xml when Syncthing runs as root
Switch to wget instead of heavyweight submodules
Show error when folder is out of sync
Don't access devices/folders when config is not loaded (fixes #876)
Use API key as password for web GUI (fixes #868)
fixed typo with send/recv rate limit
Added dialog displaying device ID and QRCode addressing #790
Added support for all versioning types in the app UI. Addressing #718
Building syncthing using android ndk toolchain
Stopped dialogs from losing state after screen rotation Fixes for: #804 #805 #807.
Fix missing path separator in folder copy target
Fix DNS resolution on IPv6 networks/resolvers
Update to Go 1.8, syncthing v0.14.24, fix dns patch for ipv6
Click region of Open folder button
Stop screen rotation from redrawing activity.  (fix #805 , #807 & #804)
Reload URL and API key when importing config
Set STGUIASSETS to let user add custom themes without root
Explain requirement for notification in "Run as foreground" setting (fixes #715)
Log SSID whitelist for better troubleshooting of #700
Set user/password in config instead of removed STGUIAUTH (fixes #704).
Disable sync if Android sync setting is disabled
Switch to wget instead of heavyweight submodules
downgrade build tools, try to fix #690
upgrades latest gradle and build tools
fix api access to activate/deactive natEnabled
fix NPE, when pressing back button on LogActivity (fixes 604)
Update Google Play and F-Droid badges
Track WiFi changes again in NetworkReceiver (fixes #625)
WIP: Remove network metered check for testing.
Add Broadcast-Receiver to remotely control the app (Addresses also #460)
Update .gitignore to ease work on both projects
WIP - Insane merge STF into official
Use go stable instead of 1.9 for travis
Fast forward master to current release branch
Fallback to http if https with TLS 1.2 is unavailable
Preserve xml encoding on read, parse and save (fixes #1234)
Show reasons for disabled service in notification dialog (fixes #1263)
Fix Syncthing getting killed by ActivityManager when started using Intent (fixes #1247)
Add debug option to fallback to http (fixes #137)
Add "receiveonly" folder type to UI and model (fixes #1210)
Root only - Temporarily increase fs.inotify.max_user_watches to 128K (fixes #1208)
Fix sending wrongly encoded commands into the unix subshell (fixes #1198)
Fix ANR probability when user configures run conditions (fixes #1196)
Fix race during config reload and missing null check (fixes #1194)
Refactor DeviceStateHolder and its receivers into RunConditionMonitor
Add options button "undo ingoring devices and folders" (fixes #938)
Add error description UI on folder error (fixes #965)
Add pull order to folder create and edit UI (fixes #677)
Fix recurring device, folder accept notifications, add ignore action (fixes #679)
Add welcome wizard slides on first start requesting permissions
Implement proper permission handling using SAF (fixes #1160)
Fix warning about missing write perm in root mode (fixes #1165)
Create or restore fragments before setAdapter is called (fixes #1162)
Add randomization to default camera folder name (fixes #1159)
Show meaningful error message if config file is missing (fixes #1156)
Fix multiple chances of a usage reporting dialog NPE (fixes #1154)
Fix NPE in DrawerFragment if syncthing is terminated (fixes #1148)
FolderActivity - fix NPE - don't update if removed (fixes #1143)
Refactor SyncthingService (lifecycle), DeviceStateHolder, RestApi, multiple fixes
Cache available debug facilities and fall back to hardcoded list (fixes #1113 #504)
Fix Lint - 109 issues before, 40 issues after
Fix Lint warning "extraneous text in resource file"
RestApi - dont dump config to logcat (fixes #1107)
Fix crash in settings onApiChange call (fixes #1084)
Reread the config on configSaved event
Fix chromium running multiple times in the background
Fix incorrect remote device syncing status UI
Correct device renaming, save config via temp file
fix config corruption on app upgrade or restore
Add pause folder and device UI
Add proxy settings to settings UI
Bypass system proxy for local webgui access
add ConfigXML support for fsWatcher transition
Fix root problems since v1.5.0+ / STMONITORED="1" (fixes #1504)
Create empty file in marker directory (fixes #1249)
removed menu decorations, decreased file sizes with optipng
Fix docker prebuild script for amd64/x86_64
build x86_64 binary to accomodate google play
Disable NAT option if a buggy 3.4 kernel is detected
Updated Syncthing to include go.sum fix
FOREGROUND_SERVICE is required if targetSdkVersion is set to 28
Add permission required by API level 28
Remove go mod download as part of build
Update build scripts and .gitignore and disable travis emails
Don't open keyboard on save to Syncthing
Fix some spelling and grammar in strings.xml
Show notification badge if user interaction is required
Fixed the README.md bug, which leads to README.md file not render the markdown correctly.
Adjust to API change regarding pending folders/devices
Fix text alignment in welcome slides (fixes #1625)
Update zxing-android-embedded and small related fixes
Stop camera when exiting QR scan with back button (fixes #1614)
Improve and fix bugs in Slovak translation
Change capitalization from Github to GitHub in Welcome wizard
Follow gplay directions regarding privacy policy and location disclosure
Explicitly mention location in privacy policy
Add privacy policy for play store
Add Internal Activity for QR Code Scanner
